name: Necron Shock
description: Dual tank buster that targets both tanks with electrical damage.

name: Fear of Death
description: Raidwide hit that spawns dark puddles with arms firing line AoEs from them.

name: Cold Grip
description: Two-part slam on a side; a glowing arm marks the repeat side.

name: Shockwave
description: Conal tank buster shockwave aimed forward. Massive damage that requires strong mitigation.

name: Shockwave
description: Raid-wide shockwave attack hitting all party members with electrical damage.

name: Fear of Death
description: Repeated fear-based party-wide magical damage.

name: Choking Grasp
description: Continued grasping attack affecting multiple players.

name: The End's Embrace
description: Party-wide magical damage representing Necron's deadly embrace.

name: Necron Shock
description: Second dual tank buster targeting both tanks with electrical damage.

name: Shockwave
description: Third raid-wide shockwave attack hitting all party members with electrical damage.

name: Grand Cross
description: Necron's signature cross-shaped magical attack dealing massive party-wide damage.

name: Grand Cross
description: Second casting of the devastating cross-shaped attack.

name: Neutron Ring
description: Massive ring-shaped magical attack dealing heavy party-wide damage.

name: Darkness of Eternity
description: Necron's ultimate darkness attack dealing massive party-wide magical damage.

name: The End's Embrace
description: Second instance of Necron's deadly embrace attack.

name: Necron Shock
description: Third dual tank buster targeting both tanks with electrical damage.

name: Shockwave
description: Fourth raid-wide shockwave attack hitting all party members with electrical damage.

name: Macabre Mark
